titleStmt.title: Ten introductions how to read, and in reading, how to vnderstand; and in vnderstanding, how to beare in mind all the bookes, chapters, and verses, contained in the holie Bible. With an answer for lawyers. Physitions. Ministers.
titleStmt.author: Vaughan, Edward, preacher at St. Mary Woolnoth.

titleStmt.title: Ten introductions how to read, and in reading, how to vnderstand; and in vnderstanding, how to beare in mind all the bookes, chapters, and verses, contained in the holie Bible. With an answer for lawyers. Physitions. Ministers.
titleStmt.author: Vaughan, Edward, preacher at St. Mary Woolnoth.

notesStmt.note: The words "lawyers. Physitions. Ministers." are bracketed together on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Some print faded, considerable print show-through, and some pages stained.
